name: Vegapunk
text:
This leader cannot attack.
Activate: Main Once Per Turn (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your Cost Area) Place up to one cost 5 or less card with the (Egghead) type from your hand face-up on top of your life or into play.

effect.text: Place up to one cost 5 or less card with the (Egghead) type from your hand face-up on top of your life or into play.
